title: Best of The Herd for May 21, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for May 21, 2020
description:
The world is changing and Taysom Hill being a starting QB isn't crazy anymore

2020 will become Jordan's 'The Last Dance' vs LeBron's Last Chance

The Cowboys consistently choose good offense over good defense

Bill Belichick is becoming Bobby Knight and that's not a good thing

Dak Prescott is a less accurate Kirk Cousins


Guest: Cam Jordan, Saints Defensive End

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
